attributes.action: Stop Foreign Criminals from Hiding Behind the Human Rights Act so that they cant be deported after serving their sentences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to stop foreign criminals who use the human rights act to stop them from being deported after they have served their sentence.

Any foreign criminal should be deported as they have proven that they are not suitable to live in our mult-cultural society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
